Articles.Content:
Who wants to play a game of Kerbal war?

STATUS: OPEN!

TO DO: Update map, add some rules, update launch site spreadsheet

General

-All launch sites are based around the sea to the west of the KSC.

So I've put together a modlist for KSP 1.3.1 with the following mods:

Spoiler

 

-Air Park

-Airplane Plus

-Aviator Arsenal "minus the trumpet part"

-BDArmory Continued

-BD Modular Missile Parts

-Decal Stickers

-Burn Together

-DCK

-Firespitter Plugin

-Fox Defense Contracts

-Hangar Extender

-Kerbal Engineer Redux

-Kerbal Foundries 

-Kerbal Joint Reinforcement

-Kerbal Konstructs

-Hyperedit

-LSHips (All)

-Infernal Robotics

-Master Tech Weapons

-Naval Artillery Systems

-Never Enough Dakka

-North Kerbin Dynamics

-Old School Turrets

-Physics Range Extender

-Procedural wings

-Procedural Parts

-SM Armory

-Take Command

-Tweak Scale

-Vangaurd EVA Parachutes

-Vessel Mover

-Wraithforge

-DMP

-BDDMP

 

Rules and Map

Can all be found here.

How to play

1) Message me that you would like to participate

-If I acknowledge your message then continue.

2) Download the "Actuallywar" save in the folder KSPWAR/Saves/INITIAL-CAZON-1/

3) Read over the rules while the world downloads

4) Once you've completed reading the rules and asking any questions I'll send a link with some custom configs for some mods.

5) I've already placed troops at my bases, you may start your initial phase and move on to your first turn.

6) When you've finished your first turn upload the save to the KSPWAR/Saves/ and name it PlayerName-TurnName and we'll go back and forth passing saves from there.

Edited March 18, 2018 by CAZON
null
